sources.title: Clean Pastures (1937)
sources.description: The Lord sees that the stock value of "Pair-o-dice" is dropping on the exchange so he dispatches a slow-witted and slow-talking angel to sinful Harlem to recruit new customers. When this fails, God finds success sending a group of musical angels with a little more swing in their style, so much so that even the Devil wants to join up! Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/clean-pastures-1937/

metadata.Plot: The Lord sees that the stock value of "Pair-o-dice" is dropping on the exchange so he dispatches a slow-witted and slow-talking angel to sinful Harlem to recruit new customers. When this fails, God finds success sending a group of musical angels with a little more swing in their style, so much so that even the Devil wants to join up!
metadata.Actors: Ben Carter Choir, Mel Blanc, Basin Street Boys
